amendment.description: To provide certain authorities necessary to carry out foreign policy objectives in Iraq and Afghanistan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3597 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3597 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S3792-3793; text: CR S3792-3793) To provide certain authorities necessary to carry out foreign policy objectives in Iraq and Afghanistan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3597 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3597 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Lugar.
